name: Chaos Game (Nickaro)
description:
In this game you play as Daegon, a demon, currently taking part in a game, in which you get points from raising chaos. You have 3 min to destroy and kill as much as you can to try and achieve your best score.

As a demon you can't interact with anything, so you have to possess people (by pressing "E" next to them) to be able to destroy stuff. But be careful, if the person you're possessing dies, you go to back to hell, which will cost you time.

You can also leave the person you're possessing at anytime (as long as they're alive) by pressing "E".
